titleInfo.title: Brother Frank Huether and Shelby Foote at Graduation

mods.abstract: Brother Frank Huether speaks with Shelby Foote at 1992 graduation ceremony. They both received honorary doctorates at this commencement. Born in Greenville, MS, Foote spent much of his writing career in Memphis. His home was not far from Christian Brothers' East Parkway campus.
